Something's been speaking to me. I keep hearing a voice say, "Gather shadow fragments," and, "Listen to our voices."

You think I'm crazy? Well I'll prove I'm not! Kill some {@LinkCreature:33#6#malevolent wraiths} in the Vertigo Reach, collect the shadow fragments, and we'll see who's crazy!

All right, let's see if this works. I'll put these to my ears.

What do you want, you damned voices? Let's hear it.

It's...oh, they're the voices of the missing soldiers!"Kaidun's soldiers?"

Yes! My amani comrades! Curses on Thulsa! Curses on this foul place!

The eldritch defenders on Anguish Heights were truly the missing soldiers, and...no!

Helehr is still up there, trying to warn us...there's a curse which permeates this place. Oh my friend!

, you must bring this information to Alssiyah!
I'm not sure what I do with the shadow fragments. Stick them in my ears?

Helehr? He was here all this time? Oh foul Thulsa, curse you for dishonoring a proud warrior so.

, you must find him. The curse may have altered his form, but he is still our comrade. Help him!
You heard my voice! I don't want anyone to see me like this, but I cannot just lie down and die when my fellow soldiers are in danger.
